mapper.insert: insert into package (package_type, package_weight, is_dangerous, is_international, detail_message) values (#{packageType}, #{packageWeight}, #{isDangerous}, #{isInternational}, #{detailMessage});
insert into bill (order_id, customer_id, charge, batch_number, pay_type, is_paid) values (#{orderId}, #{customerId}, #{charge}, #{batchNumber}, #{payType}, #{isPaid});

insert into transport (transport_id, order_id, carrier_id, carrier_type, transport_times_of_carrier, input_time, output_time, next_carrier_id, next_carrier_type, status, trans_detail_message) values (#{transportId}, #{orderId}, #{carrierId}, #{carrierType}, #{transportTimesOfCarrier}, #{inputTime}, #{outputTime}, #{nextCarrierId}, #{nextCarrierType}, #{status}, #{transDetailMessage});
insert into damage_record (carrier_id, carrier_type, damage_record_time) values (#{carrierId}, #{carrierType}, #{damageRecordTime});
